summary: Adds some very powerful spells. WARNING: Not Balanced
descriptionHtml:
[font=Book Antiqua][SIZE=4][color=#953734][b][i]News: A relaunch of Godly Spells is planned. Give me time this will still be a bit, but in the end this will prove much better than a patch or even continuation of the current version of Godly Spells.

In the relaunch there will be:

1: Less bugs

2: Better instructions and documentation

3: Available source scripts ( so that even if I go inactive again, the mod is still free to be developed by anyone )

I've given more information about this in the comments section.

Until then, I sincerely apologize to everyone for the annoyance with my mod.

If you have fallen victim to the infamous glow effect bug this mod has, this thread may be able to help you. http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/854562-sovngarde-glow-doesnt-dissapear-after-final-quest/

 [/i][/b][/color][/SIZE][/font]


ATTENTION: [i]This mod has had a problem with one of the spells leaving a visual effect after using the spell Acsencion. Even if you uninstall the mod, the effect will stay. 

The reason I haven't gotten to patching this already, is because I lost all of the source scripts. Yes, the compiled ones are still available, but I lost the source. Luckily it appears some programmers have created PEX decompilers, which I will give a run. If it works, the speed I'll get this done will be much faster. If not however, well being completely honest I'll need a lot of time to rewrite my scripts. 

So, for now, unless you're ok with your character having the effect 24/7 and your PC is beefy enough ( As while it doesn't happen to me, for many the effect seems to make a noticeable hit on FPS ) , do not use the Ascension spell or simply do not download this mod altogether.

[/i][/b]UPDATE: The decompiler does work, sort of. I'm not sure how well it'll handle the scripts that make use of SKSE, but this should help a lot all the same. It doesn't decompile them so that they work perfectly out of the box, but they are human readable. 

Note: As of now this mod is basically full on dead. I simply don't have time to work on this by myself anymore. I greatly wish to get started again but by myself I just can't. I announce when I can make a return. 

[font=Book Antiqua][SIZE=7][color=#953734][b][i]Godly Spells[/i][/b][/color][/SIZE][/font]

[font=Book Antique]All spells are found in a chest next to Alvor's work bench at his forge in Riverwood.[/font]

[font=Book Antiqua]Godly Spells is a mod that adds new spells to bring you power beyond your imagination. Create explosions the size of a building. Make your physical form change on a whim. Bend your very soul closer to perfection, from strength, to forces of nature, and Ascension itself. [/font]

[font=Book Antiqua] The Current Great Powers -[/font]

[font=Book Antiqua] God Blast - Cast a strike of lightning so mighty everything will shake around it. [/font]
[font=Book Antiqua]
[/font]
[font=Book Antiqua] Infernal God Blast - Bring upon an explosion the size of buildings, and the power of 100 catapults.[/font]
[font=Book Antiqua]
[/font]
[font=Book Antiqua] Teleport - Bend space and travel instantaneously through Skyrim.[/font]
[font=Book Antiqua]
[/font]
[font=Book Antiqua] Godly Firestorm - Summon the aid of the Stones of the Heavens. [/font]
[font=Book Antiqua]
[/font]
[font=Book Antiqua] God Soulrend:[/font]
[font=Book Antiqua]
[/font]
[font=Book Antiqua] Godly Strength - Alter your soul's physical energy to outmatch a giants. [/font]
[font=Book Antiqua]
[/font]
[font=Book Antiqua] Fire - Kindle your soul to fire, burn everything.[/font]
[font=Book Antiqua] Fire Summon - Summon fire and wreak havoc[/font]

[font=Book Antiqua] Lightning - Spontaneous immense power, speed, awe, the properties of lightning.[/font]
[font=Book Antiqua]
[/font]
[font=Book Antiqua] Ascension - Ascend to a true immortal for a mortal moment, become unstoppable. [/font]
[font=Book Antiqua]
[/font]
[font=Book Antiqua] God Bodyrend:[/font]
[font=Book Antiqua]
[/font]
[font=Book Antiqua] Bear - Become one of the most physically strong and endurable predators of all time[/font]
[font=Book Antiqua]
[/font]
[font=Book Antiqua] Great Bear - The highest and most feared of Ursus. [/font]
[font=Book Antiqua]
[/font]
[font=Book Antiqua] Sabrecat - The great fanged predator of speed and power. [/font]
[font=Book Antiqua]
[/font]
[font=Book Antiqua] Giant - The largest known biped of Tamriel. [/font]
[font=Book Antiqua]
[/font]
[font=Book Antiqua] Titan - What is more fearsome than an immense giant? A hulking immense one, altered to be even larger.[/font]
[font=Book Antiqua] Such a large humanoid race could never emerge naturally due to the laws of Nirn.[/font]
[font=Book Antiqua]
[/font]
[font=Book Antiqua]
[/font]
[font=System] Note: Please read the book "Ways of Giant Combat" it will give you instructions on how to properly use of the giants attacks. Not just the typical hand/club swing. [/font]
[font=System]
[/font]
[font=Impact][size=5][color=#205867]Help Wanted:[/color][/size][/font]

[font=System][color=#205867]Currently no help is being accepted.[/color][/font]
author: Haugerud15328

files.name: GodlySpells1_2
files.changelogHtml:
Filled Godly Strength Kill Move glitch. Actors will now always die.
Added Shapeshift spell (currently only for giant)
Godly Undead Summon - Summoned undead will now both follow the player and dispel after 7m

files.name: GodlySpellsV1_3
files.changelogHtml:
Added some more shapeshift spells.
Started new series of soulrend spells. They are related to Godly Strength and Ascension
Godly Strength (and other physical enhancement spells) will work with all weapons, not just fists.
